lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in St. Louis will not charge the police officer who fatally shot VonDerrit D. Myers Jr. in October.

headline.print_headline: Missouri: No Charge for St. Louis Officer in Killing
headline.main: Missouri: No Charge for St. Louis Officer in Killing

snippet: Prosecutors in St. Louis will not charge the police officer who fatally shot VonDerrit D. Myers Jr. in October.
abstract: Prosecutors in St Louis decide not to charge white Police Officer Jason Flanery in October 2014 fatal shooting of black teenager VonDerrit D Myers Jr.
